languages.text: "Теодора фон Валанциус была женщиной широких взглядов, однако мудрейшая Тисифона не поддерживала многие ее... начинания. И мы не будем. Боюсь, в этом предложении дом Орселлио вынужден отказать Вольному Торговцу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Регент Ааронто жадно облизывается.{/n} "Теодора фон Валанциус была женщиной широких взглядов, однако мудрейшая Тисифона не поддерживала многие ее... начинания. И мы не будем. Боюсь, в этом предложении дом Орселлио вынужден отказать Вольному Торговцу".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius was a very open-minded woman, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavours. And neither should we. We are afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."
languages.original_text: "Теодора фон Валанциус была женщиной широких взглядов, однако мудрейшая Тисифона не поддерживала многие ее... начинания. И мы не будем. Боюсь, в этом предложении дом Орселлио вынужден отказать Вольному Торговцу".

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius was a woman of broad views, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavors. And neither should we. I am afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius was a woman of broad views, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavors. And neither should we. I am afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius was a very open-minded woman, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavours. And neither should we. We are afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius was a very open-minded woman, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavours. And neither should we. We are afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius was a very open-minded woman, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavours. And neither should we. We are afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯是位思想非常开放的女性，但贤明的提西福涅并不支持她的许多……做法，恐怕我们也不应该这么做。很遗憾，奥赛罗家族恐怕不得不拒绝行商浪人的提议。”
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius was a very open-minded woman, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavours. And neither should we. We are afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯是位思想非常开放的女性，但贤明的提西福涅并不支持她的许多……做法，恐怕我们也不应该这么做。很遗憾，奥塞罗家族恐怕不得不拒绝行商浪人的提议。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Theodora von Valancius era una mujer con una gran visión, pero la sagaz Tisiphone no apoyó muchas de sus... empresas. Y nosotros tampoco debemos. Me temo que debemos rechazar la oferta, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius was a very open-minded woman, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavours. And neither should we. We are afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."

traits.locale_text: «Theodora von Valancius era una mujer con una gran visión, pero la sagaz Tisiphone no apoyó muchas de sus... empresas. Y nosotros tampoco debemos. Me temo que debemos rechazar la oferta, Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスはとても柔軟な女性だったが、賢明なティシフォンは彼女の多くの試みを支持しなかった。我々もそうすべきだ。オーセリオ家は自由開拓者の申し出を断らざるを得ないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius was a very open-minded woman, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavours. And neither should we. We are afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスはとても柔軟な女性だったが、賢明なティシフォンは彼女の多くの試みを支持しなかった。我々もそうすべきだ。オーセリオ家は自由開拓者の申し出を断らざるを得ないだろう」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius war eine sehr aufgeschlossene Frau, aber die scharfsinnige Tisiphone unterstützte nur wenige ihrer ... Vorhaben. Und wir sollten es auch so halten. Leider muss das Haus Orsellio das Angebot {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ablehnen."
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius was a very open-minded woman, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavours. And neither should we. We are afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius war eine sehr aufgeschlossene Frau, aber die scharfsinnige Tisiphone unterstützte nur wenige ihrer ... Vorhaben. Und wir sollten es auch so halten. Leider muss das Haus Orsellio das Angebot {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ablehnen."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Théodora von Valancius était une femme très ouverte d'esprit. Pour autant l'avisée Tisiphone n'approuvait pas bon nombre de ses entreprises. Il nous faut suivre son exemple. La maison Orsellio est au regret de devoir décliner l'offre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius was a very open-minded woman, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavours. And neither should we. We are afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."

traits.locale_text: « Théodora von Valancius était une femme très ouverte d'esprit. Pour autant l'avisée Tisiphone n'approuvait pas bon nombre de ses entreprises. Il nous faut suivre son exemple. La maison Orsellio est au regret de devoir décliner l'offre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius, son derece açık zihinli bir kadındı. Güçlü sezgilere sahip olmasıyla bilinen Tisiphone ise onun birçok eylemini desteklemezdi. Biz de aynısını yapmalıyız. Korkarım Orsellio Hanesi, Hür Tacir'in teklifini geri çevirmek durumunda."
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius was a very open-minded woman, but sagacious Tisiphone did not support many of her... endeavours. And neither should we. We are afraid House Orsellio will have to refuse the Rogue Trader's offer."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius son derece açık zihinli bir kadındı ancak güçlü sezgilere sahip olmasıyla bilinen Tisiphone onun birçok eylemini desteklemezdi. Biz de aynı yoldan gitmeliyiz. Korkarım Orsellio Hanesi, Hür Tacir'in teklifini geri çevirmek durumunda."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
